def InitializeRow(entity, row): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.GestaoDeProjetos import GPProjetoTarefas from Benner.Tecnologia.Business import Query from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BennerContext
sqlParticipante = Query("SELECT USUARIO FROM GP_PROJETOPARTICIPANTES WHERE PROJETO = "+str(entity.ProjetoHandle) +" AND USUARIO = "+ str(BennerContext.Security.GetLoggedUserHandle())) result = sqlParticipante.Execute()
ehParticipante = result != None and len(result)>0 ehGestor =entity.ProjetoInstance.GestorProjetoHandle == BennerContext.Security.GetLoggedUserHandle()
tarefaConcluida = GPProjetoTarefas.TarefaConcluida(entity.TarefaHandle)
if row.EditCommand != None: row.EditCommand.Visible = not tarefaConcluida and entity.PermiteManterApontamentos and (ehParticipante or ehGestor) if row.DeleteCommand != None: row.DeleteCommand.Visible = not tarefaConcluida and entity.PermiteManterApontamentos and (ehParticipante or ehGestor)
